content: the following patterns in the coats & clark o n t #230 featuring 14 new pineapple designs publication use variations of this pineapple motif pineapple runner #7770-a 1 pineapple vanity set #7770-b 2 uses 4 balls of any color and a number 10 steel crochet hook pattern also includes a vanity set one oval doily and two small round doilies materials j & p coats or clark s o n t best six cord mercerized crochet *size 30* small ball * j & p coats-3 balls of white or ecru or 4 balls of any color or * clark s o n t -4 balls of white or ecru or 5 balls of any color steel crochet hook no 10 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pineapple-runner-7770-a 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pineapple-vanity-set-7770-b
